passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal {{as|15 magic damage}} every second to enemies within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 325 (+ 100% '''bonus''' [[size]]) units, with the damage being increased to 150% against {{tip|minions}} and 200% against {{tip|monsters}}. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
